definition: of metal e.g., a special way of doing something
details:
adjective
- of metal e.g.
= example: of metal e.g.
= synonyms: crumpled, dented
- used of the back and knees
= synonyms: bended
- fixed in your purpose
= example: fixed in your purpose
= synonyms: bent on, dead set, out to
noun
- a special way of doing something
= example: a special way of doing something
= synonyms: hang
- a relatively permanent inclination to react in a particular way
= synonyms: set
- an area of grassland unbounded by fences or hedges
- grass for pastures and lawns especially bowling and putting greens
= synonyms: bent grass, bent-grass
